index 678f637..892a597 100644
--- a/CICD/pipeline.yml
+++ b/CICD/pipeline.yml
@@ -1,13 +1,22 @@

   - build
   - test
-  - deploy
+  - staging
+  - production
 
 jobs:
   build:
     stage: build
     script: 'make build'
 
   test:
     stage: test
     script: 'make test'
+

+    stage: staging
+    script: 'make deploy-staging'
+  
+  production:
+    stage: production
+    script: 'make deploy-production'

diff --git a/sql/src/test/java/io/crate/integrationtests/SnapshotRestoreIntegrationTest.java b/sql/src/test/java/io/crate/integrationtests/SnapshotRestoreIntegrationTest.java
index 54df529a3..215e84e0e 100644
--- a/sql/src/test/java/io/crate/integrationtests/SnapshotRestoreIntegrationTest.java
+++ b/sql/src/test/java/io/crate/integrationtests/SnapshotRestoreIntegrationTest.java
@@ -325,7 +325,7 @@ public class SnapshotRestoreIntegrationTest extends SQLTransportIntegrationTest
         execute("RESTORE SNAPSHOT " + snapshotName() + " TABLE my_table_1 with (" +
                 "wait_for_completion=true)");
 
-        execute("select schema_name || '.' || table_name from information_schema.tables where schema_name='doc'");
+        execute("select schema_name || '.' || table_name from information_schema.tables where schema_name='doc' order by 1");
         assertThat(TestingHelpers.printedTable(response.rows()), is("doc.my_table_1\ndoc.my_table_2\n"));
     }
